website_summaries.verdict: An affordable umbrella that provides ample sun protection for most days at the beach. You won't find one with more features for a lower price.
pros: In addition to the attractive price, this umbrella is packed with features including 50 UPF sun protection, large canopy with windows, and sturdy ground stakes
Easy to put up and fold down
cons: Doesn't hold up very well on windy days
The center pole is hollow and feels flimsy
It's awkward to maneuver when in the carrying bag

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ridiculous. I contact the company and their response ...
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, the product no longer matches the pictures online or in the manual. The bottom of the pole has been redesigned, it is now impossible to insert it into anything due to having a blunt end. The lever locking mechanism also can not even hold the tension of the umbrella standing on its own weight. Pretty ridiculous. I contact the company and their response was "sorry - not sorry"
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: Saw a few others on the beach but we used ours a little more like an umbrella than a dome
customer_reviews.text: We used this umbrella for a week at the beach. Saw a few others on the beach but we used ours a little more like an umbrella than a dome. Kept the sun off but allowed for wind to blow through so kept it cool underneath. So easy to set up and took only seconds. I purchased one of those larger sand anchors you can screw in to the sand to hold it in place. I also had some larger stakes that helped. We had a few windy days and our umbrella never budged. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, effective - and I'm a mobile ad for this product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't often bother to write reviews, but this product is worth the time. For the last 4YEARS I have relied on this to shield me at football, softball, and baseball games in both blazing sun and miserable rain. Because it's an umbrella, and has handy screen openings, I get plenty of breeze when it's a scorcher. But the huge canopy also provides plenty of coverage in rain. People I don't know always approach me and ask where I got this and whether it's easy. I have raved over this for years now. Sport-Brella should hire me to advertise for them, because I'm a huge fan!
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Good but defective product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product but one of the grommets came out of the anchor strap (after using only twice). I emailed the company along with a few pictures but never heard back. Will update this review if they actually address the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Chi

customer_reviews.title: Really excellent product! While it's a little on the heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent product! While it's a little on the heavy side, it's very easy to set up and take down and best of all....it goes back into the carrying sleeve with no problem!! None of this 'once it's out it's not going back in' nonsense! We got this to use outdoors with our baby and as you can see, it's very roomy for multiple kids/adults.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Totally Useless
customer_reviews.text: Spent an hour trying to get all of the anchors and support lines in place only for them to slide out after every light breeze. It's also impossible to use this as a standard umbrella out of the box because there's no way to lock the center pole into place. Even with the latch "secured" the pole retracts as soon as it hits the sand. Also, unlike every other item I've returned on Amazon, I wasn't offered the option of arranging a UPS pickup. They probably hope you'll just give up rather than have to lug a bulky item down the the UPS store.
customer_reviews.author: gladeplugin787

customer_reviews.title: Aweosme
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is aweosme ! We live in NYC and the winds could get very strong on the beach , hence why I was skeptical even to try an umbrella since we usually go through several per summer . This umbrella is super easy to set up and withstands the crazy winds . We fit both of our beach chairs under neath and hang out very comfortably under it. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: mariya

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product-telescoping pole doesn't extend.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product after seeing many great reviews. Unfortunately, the telescoping extension pole does not extend and we could not use this product appropriately at the beach. We read & re-read the directions and watched YouTube videos to ensure it wasn't a user error. Bought 3wks in advance of a Beach vacation only to find out this was broken/defective upon opening at beach. Incredibly frustrating! Unless this company can ensure a one-time concern & re-issue a functioning product in place- I would say look elsewhere. There are much easier products on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase I've made for beach/lake items. It was easy to setup and take down and when the sun's position moved, it was so simple to rotate the umbrella slightly to give us plenty of shade. We received tons of compliments - everyone was jealous of our setup :)
customer_reviews.author: ~michele

customer_reviews.title: unSportsmen-Brella
customer_reviews.text: Bought one May 2016, used it a total of 5 times before it folded backwards in normal breezy beach conditions. Now unusable! Of all the umbrellas on the beach, my Sport-Brella was the only effected by this breeze. The very popular Tommy Bahama and the cheapo beach store umbrellas litter the beach weathered just fine. It was cool while it lasted, but the cheap manufacturing makes this a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: David Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Bad first impression
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a good look for the product when right out of the box the first piece you see is broken. I saw poor reviews of the bag before I purchased the item but now I too am a victim. The umbrella itself was fine. I have a attached a picture of what I consider a weak point where the wind could do some damage. I will give the product an updated review after beach use but so far I am disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: summer necessity!
customer_reviews.text: I am not an outdoors person and pale skin in the desert makes the experience even more unpleasant. My husband gave me crap when I bought the sportsbella saying that I'd never use it but over the summer I used it all the time with my very active 3 year old! I just left it in the trunk all summer. It was so nice having an instant shady spot at the park, lake or splash pad. It's so easy to open and close and even squishing it all back into the carry bag isn't that troublesome.
customer_reviews.author: mike d

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have only attempted to use this item four times. It does not work as advertised. It only works in the position where it lays on the ground, but doesn’t offer any height. It looks like it supposed to lock in place, but it doesn’t. You can’t really lock into the ground because the umbrella keeps collapsing. I have seen other people with them, and they seem to work well; but mine is a dud.
customer_reviews.author: A mom's work is never done!

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately instead of getting this cool sports umbrella that is pictured we received a lounge chair with a tiny umbrella. I ordered two of these for a soccer tournament. They arrived on time and I packed in the back of our van feeling brilliant. It rained as predicted and went to pull this baby out feeling great and it was a lounge chair. I was NOT HAPPY!!! Have returned and received a refund. Not sure where mistake was made but I did not get this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy “Amazon inspected”
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this “used, like new...“ Supposedly inspected and repackaged by Amazon warehouse. The product came with one end covered in sticky oil. In the bag there were two large rips. On the umbrella itself there were three more smaller rips. I thought maybe I could repair them and clean it up. After all, I did save $11. When I unfolded the umbrella to try and set it up, the entire stand was completely broken and sheared. I think the sharp edges of the broken metal are what caused all the holes throughout the umbrella. This was clearly broken before it was “inspected and repackaged.” LAST TIME I BUY “USED, LIKE NEW” from Amazon. 😕 :-(
customer_reviews.author: Electra_SF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sun protection, roomy and well made, too
customer_reviews.text: We really did like the Sport-brella once we had it set up, but I'd recommend a practice run before trying to deal with at the beach, etc. We had some difficulty with opening the Sport-brella, and it took two of us initially to open and set it up (I'm not sure I could do it on my own since I don't have the hand strength that my husband has). Once set up, though, it was great, and very sturdy in spite of some gusty winds. It gives great sun protection and has some nice features - the zip-able window openings, storage pockets, and 2 types of stakes for different conditions. An investment, but we thought it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Even a light wind will DESTROY this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It was great until a 10 MPH gust came along. Pulled it out of the ground and, when we grabbed the center pole, it turned it inside-out, bending and damaging the frame beyond repair and ripping the fabric off the frame. One use; it was destroyed! I would strongly not recommend buying this for the beach! I felt like I totally wasted my money on this product - donʻt be like me :-)
customer_reviews.author: 'Iokepa Bardwell

customer_reviews.title: pretty good beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The pros: it's easy to assemble, like opening and closing an umbrella -it's easy to carry, light-ish weight -enough space for 2 adults + children comfortably -it does actually provide good shade with some ventilation for hot beach days The cons: if you have a group like 4 adults with camping chairs, then some of you will likely be in the sun or have your neck touching the umbrella -if it's really windy, the stakes might not be enough to keep this thing from blowing over -to get good stability, you probably will have to dig down the middle pole a bit into the ground into of just surface stabbing it in
customer_reviews.author: Tiann C

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to use when taking the grandchildren fishing during the summer. This was great. We were able to put chairs under and the grandchildren could sit and fish, eat lunch and even put down a blanket for them to play. When it started raining, we got the 'brella' and di dot get wet. If you travel to the beach, this is the product to have. The windows and the windows flaps are great also. A breeze travels through when the flaps are open and did not have to worry about the rain coming in. A great product for those who love the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cynthia Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Only good if the sun’s at your back
customer_reviews.text: I thought I’d love this product. Based on the reviews I was convinced this would be the perfect stay away from me during COVID umbrella that would also keep you the sun off me while watching my sons ball games. I couldn’t be more wrong. It’s only good if the suns at your back and even then it’s hot as balls under the umbrella because it traps the heat and humidity if you keep the sides down. Not worth it. Hoping that the fact that it traps the air may mean it’ll keep me warm as it gets cooler but for now I just feel like I wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Online shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: So I planned our family vacations for weeks, got this thing took to the beach and assembled. Well at least i tried. Unfortunately the pole wouldnt lock in position, so any pressure against it would make the 2pieces join. I was furious looking at everyone else much cheaper umbrellas just working. To make all things harder the sun on almost the entire east cost will be in front of you, if you protect yourself you cant watch the kids. My advice is just to go and buy a normal beach umbrella instead of these angled. I am returning this.... didnt work for us.
customer_reviews.author: achillesmf

customer_reviews.title: Plastic spike, useless clamp.
customer_reviews.text: Short summary: This would be absolutely dangerous if you used at a beach with moderate wind. I should have listened to other reviews. The original sunbrella has a solid metal spike. This version is hollow thin metal with a dull plastic tip with a small rivet holding it on. The clamp is equally cheapened. It used to be a metal bolt with thumb knob. Now it is a weak lever that does not come close to locking the spike pole to the umbrella. No joke, my 8yr old daughter pushed them together.
customer_reviews.author: Lekrem

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping second pole broken/missing
customer_reviews.text: Inspect this upon arrival. I didn’t get around to using it because it is huge and pretty heavy... and just now noticing the “telescoping second pole” to make the pole long is missing... looks like it broke off at some point in the manufacturing process. Therefore the wind will blow it over bc the pole is too short to dig into the sand. if you’re one person carrying it, a bag and also my dog on her leash, I bought this for the dog beach with her... it is too heavy and it is nearly as tall as me at 5’2. I had to pick between this and my beach chair. Too late to return now... not happy
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with hole in mesh
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this umbrella in March excited to use it for swim season this summer. We finally opened it for the first time last week and to our surprise the side mesh had a huge hole in out. Right out of the package and a hole. My son was so upset after pleading me to order him one of these for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lippert

customer_reviews.title: I really like it! 🌊 🏖 🏝
customer_reviews.text: We just got this yesterday and we immediately had to test it out in the garage to see what it looked like. I was impressed by how truly easy it is to assemble. It’s just like opening a regular umbrella. I can’t wait to use it on the beach once we move to Florida in a few months. I’ll update my review then 🏖 but as of right now I love the print, it seems really high quality, it’s moderately light weight for the size and it’s a breeze to open and close as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Best lightweight portable shade
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sport-brella for 2 reasons. Sometimes while watching the kids at their outdoor sporting events, this tent is perfect for 2 adults. I have also used it on rainy days to help keep the kids (players) dry while they are sitting on the bench. It can easily fit 4 kids, and keep they shaded or dry. It's super lightweight, so easy to set up, and gives you instant protection without the bulk. This is a great quality product, and can be used at the fields, at the beach, on a picnic.... anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Sean P

customer_reviews.title: Not made for beach? Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this purchase because my daughters and I love the beach. We had been looking for something for shade for the family that was compact. When we got to the beach, it did not open easily. I'm not sure if it is not meant for sand and beaches but it never seemed to open up correctly. Since we were already there, and we'd lugged it to the beach (not the lightest umbrella), we crawled under but I'm sure it was meant to have an opening as the picture implied; it was quite claustrophobic without an entranceway. I will be returning this for nearly fifty dollars, I just expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Bad redesign
customer_reviews.text: The redesign from my 10yr old one isn't good. The pole is plastic instead of metal and has a blunt tip instead of a point. The locking mechanism is now a pressure clamp where it used to be a screw to tighten it. The last thing is that there are no hooks on top of the umbrella to secure the side flaps if you don't want to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Muchosa1

customer_reviews.title: Loved the sun protection
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this umbrella for an outdoor festival in west Texas. It provided shade and relief from the sun over 3 days. I'm redheaded and fair skinned and didn't have to put sunscreen on- the baby who can't wear sunscreen yet was fully protected also! It was easy to put up and came down quickly. We loved the umbrella retraction instead of messing with tent poles. A great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. I bought this umbrella for my boyfriend for ...
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I bought this umbrella for my boyfriend for Christmas so he could use this disc golf, camping, and at the beach. Unfortunately, since I bought it at Christmas time, it was a few months before he could actually use it. Once we finally got the chance to use it, the main shaft snapped in half while opening it for the first time outside - and we got stuck in the rain all day. We didn't even get to use ONCE! I hope I'm still in the time frame to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Wade

customer_reviews.title: BENT POLE ON SECOND USE EVEN WITH ANCHOR
customer_reviews.text: THE POLE BENT ON THE SECOND USE. HOW DO I GET A REPLACEMENT? purchased less than 60 days ago. the umbrella is light weight and easy to carry and set up. fits in the trunk of honda accord and toyota camry. it provides a good amount of shade. the only complaint is the pole bending. I would like a replacement please.
customer_reviews.author: Shosh

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product it held up to some pretty Highwinds at the beach. I did return it in favor of something a little bit larger the 9 foot Sunbrella. This was the final product however I had a requirement for something larger it was available and with three grandsons eight and under I needed the additional space. If you don’t have the number of people I have this is a great choice it is easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Tuna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is like carrying a regular umbrella to the beach. Its lightweight and so easy to set up. It literally took us 3 minutes to set it up. It stayed for the most part of the day attached to the ground with the metal spikes. It provided us with great shade and wind protection on myrtle beach for about 6 hours straight. There is enough room for 2 full size adults under the umbrella. It would make a great umbrella for little children to play under for the sun protection. I recommend this to anyone looking to spend the day at the beach in the sun. We would purchase again and again. Plus you get super fast shipping as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tony&Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this for beach days! I usually end up at the beach with two kids by myself, so having a fast set up for some sun shade is KEY! This literally takes me a minute to set up. I'm in love. Everything about it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: What were they thinking
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine for the most part. But they use metal zippers and grommets instead of plastic. Metal rusts. As a result the product because almost unusable because you can not use the zippers and the grommets once rusted. The windows can't be opened and the canvas grommets tear once the metal eye and reused. Could plastic zippers and grommets cost that much more? It does what its supposed to do in terms of easy setup, sun protection and the like but with the metal weaknesses mentioned above the product almost because a disposable product. What a waist and what a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella when you need it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works well. Bought it for use during son's soccer games. Used it in windy rainy weather and it performed well. It kept us dry and warm with plenty of room. Shorter chairs would be be better than taller chairs as you can push them further back into the shelter without hitting your head. It takes up about the same room as 2 chairs side by side. It's just about as easy to set up as opening an umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: David Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Love this umbrella! For beach or backyard it's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is exactly what we needed for the beach and backyard barbeques. The sides are great and you can create this awesome private space on even a crowded beach. It eliminates your peripheral view of other beachgoers and it is very effective at blocking the sun. Used a basic plastic sand anchor and a couple metal stakes for stability and it stayed in the sand with no issues. I can do it pretty well by myself ( two people makes it very quick and easy) We have used this umbrella in the backyard with a quilt underneath for an easy sun shelter for babies. It really is easy enough to use that you can break it out every weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really impressed with this umbrella. It looks nice and it seems easy enough for anyone to use but it is a CHEAP material. It has a couple little holes already and it only came today (an hour ago). I will probably send it back and get a cheaper umbrella from a box store (the material on those look much thicker). If you want this for only one summer then by all means buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Soccer mom Approved
customer_reviews.text: As a soccer mom, this thing has saved me from rain, hail, sun, and from talking to other crazy parents. HA! Okay but really, this umbrella was a great buy! easy to carry with a slip case and long handle. It goes over your shoulder just like your butterfly chairs would. The stakes aren't always necessary but work well and have a small bag to keep everything together. Sturdy, well made, and great color! When sitting on its side like in the picture, you can fit a chair under it and sit comfortably. It's saved us from soggy soccer bags, and bad sunburn more times than I can count. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ortlieb

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella for beach, ball games rain or shine!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our vacation on the beach and were so thankful we had it. It is very easy to tote, set up, and take down. My husband and i sat fully covered with beach chairs and our two boys had plenty of room to join us in the shade. We received many inquiries as to where we got our umbrella from other beach goers with beach umbrellas that were way less functional. We love the flaps on the sides and the ventilation this provides. And the price makes this purchase decision a no brained!
customer_reviews.author: CARRIE SENTZ

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! We got it for our trip to Destin and it held up nicely, even on a windy day. For our scenario, the 3/4 large spikes worked fine and did not need the smaller spiked nor the string tie down. Very easy to assemble and take down. The only negative I could notice was its a little long and somewhat heavy when carrying but that's expected due to the quality. Considering purchasing another for future beach trips.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Scam, not what you see in video!!!
customer_reviews.text: The video clearly shows recieving a product with a solid steel mounting post with a twist to tighten adjustment for the steel rod you would pound in the ground. I recieved some new and improved model that is a joke and it would fall apart if you were to hit it with a hammer to drive the spike into the ground. It has a stupid flip latch to try and secure the two sections together. It is not what yo see in the video and is a total scam, don't waste your time like I did mine. Buy one from an honest seller, not a scam artist like this place!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Melton

customer_reviews.title: You have to buy this, especially if you have kids
customer_reviews.text: We use this on the beach all the time, we carry it on our road trips or anywhere we think that we need sun protection. Works awesome for 2 adults and 2 small kids, easy to assemble and packing up. We have had this for 5 years and it worked like a charm. One thing to note is that this is not bulky, but is long because the stem does not fold, which also contribute to the robustness of it. We did damage one of the fingers of the umbrella - our own fault. Will definitely get the same one again once the old one (well used) is ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Ke Wang

customer_reviews.title: Useful for baby’s/kids!
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely useful if you have a child. We bought it for beach use. It can get windy... so the side flaps make it not as windy. The little windows bring in air. You anchor it down with the anchors it comes with or pocket sand. People at the beach were asking where we got it lol. We loved it covers more than 3 people for sure lol. Get a bunch beach towel!
customer_reviews.author: Lina N. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Easy, convenient, & great price
customer_reviews.text: This is EXACTLY what we were looking for! Takes up so little space yet provides great sun protection. We put our baby bouncer and little baby pool underneath this umbrella, and away she goes. Less worrying about sunburns and no worries of sun directly to the face and eyes. Amazing price and will definitely have lots of use for this in the future at outdoor sporting events and at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this product...so easy to put up and take down and provides great protection from the sun. Had several people walk up to us on the beach to ask where we had purchased it. Only thing I would advise is that there are beach communities where this is not allowed as nothing can be tethered to the sand and only upright umbrellas are allowed. This was the case where we initiated use of the sportbrella, but the nice thing is it also worked well as an upright umbrella and provided sufficient coverage. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great for windy days at the beach
customer_reviews.text: Bought the turquoise color which is very nice. Made our days at Cannon Beach even more enjoyable. Super easy to set up. We were having pretty strong winds so I put a rock in each of the side pockets for added measure. The sand was really soft and I didn't want to risk a blow away. It held up great! Can't wait to use again.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother - only used three times before it became useless
customer_reviews.text: If you get sand on the telescoping pole, you must be vigilant about removing all of it, before collapsing the pole for storage. I cannot get the pole to release due to sand stuck inside the inside/outside pole and I've only had this umbrella since March 2019 and it went in the garbage in August 2019 after three uses. WD40, wrenches - nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Great when its not flying away
customer_reviews.text: When it stays up it’s amazing. Perfect size for our little family. But unless the conditions, both wind and sand, are just right be prepared to chase it down the beach a time or two.
customer_reviews.author: John David

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella worked great for our beach trip! It was easy to assemble and it helped keep the sun out of the kid's faces as they played in the sand. It wasn't windy, so I'm not sure how it will hold up with wind gusts, but there are tie downs and that helped keep it sturdy. Because the sand is soft it was a little hard to get the anchors down in the sand, but my husband pushed them in pretty far and it held up great. Highly recommend this umbrella. I wish there was a feature for it to fold when it was upright to angle towards the sun. That was the only negative thing I saw.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Dickert

customer_reviews.title: Great Shade
customer_reviews.text: We put this up at an Atlantic beach with unrelenting wind. We are two people with decent experience in tents and the like. Our Sportbrella went up and was secured within five minutes and stayed in place for the several hours we wished it to. We took it down and had it back in the bag in about the same amount of time it took to put it up. Because we have experience with camping disasters, I put this Sunbrella up in my backyard ( very little wind) before taking this show on the road, and (at sixty years of age, 5' 2" and middling condition) was able to accomplish the set-up and take-down by myself with similar time results.
customer_reviews.author: Laffanyway

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this but not the actual product. Very expensive mediocre beach tent/umbrella. Cons. Doesn't crow into the sand/ground. The extended rod always slides back in. The metal sticks that are supposed to keep it in the ground down. Very heavy. I had such high Hope's for this but just another hunk of junk :,(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to expand and set up but low to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is cumbersome. Fairly easy to expand and set up but low to the ground and awkward if you are not sitting down on the ground. The flaps were actually annoying and the stakes were not easy to put into the ground. Just too complicated and annoying to put back into the bag (and not lose all the stakes it comes with). Actually bought a standard Tommy Bahama beach umbrella from Costco and it's so much easier! Just expand the umbrella and use the corkscrew end to stick it into the ground. Done.
customer_reviews.author: jwu

customer_reviews.title: The bottom line is we find that this is a wonderful windblock and sunblock for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Sport-Brella we have owned, the first lasted many years of constant use on the beach. The change in the clip that holds the post doesn't bother us, but the removal of the handy snap to keep up the flaps is a pain. Without a way to fasten the flaps up it does make it harder to put the sportbrella back in the bag. The bottom line is we find that this is a wonderful windblock and sunblock for the beach, easy to lug, easy to put up, easy to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: mountainmare

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great idea but...
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great idea but with the amount of angle you need to put it in the ground it’s hard to get much shade. It blocks the wind which makes it really hot underneath but once you open the air windows the sun gets in taking away some of the sun protection. Also has metal rings that rust after a few uses. It’s difficult to set up and once it’s setup it doesn’t really give off the benefits you hope for. It’s also too close to the ground that you can’t sit under it in a chair.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Berke

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella! Mediocre stakes.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I got this. It's made my trips to the beach much more enjoyable, since I now have shelter from the sun. It opens and closes very easily and is reasonably lightweight. We've had stronger winds lately but I didn't worry about the umbrella itself breaking. Seems really sturdy. However, the stakes that come with it are not stable in soft sand--they are too short. I went ahead and bought better stakes which work much, much better and now it's great!
customer_reviews.author: HJ88

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Has a large space underneath. I bought this to replace another product that was a small dome like tent that broke. This seemed sturdy and more multi-purpose. I just wish it had a floor like the tent did. A blanket solves that problem but it is one more thing to carry. I used it sideways the way it appears in the advertised picture. The first time it blew over but that is more just getting used to having a bigger size at the beach. I can see using it standing up and it being better coverage than my current umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Third purchase, not a long term usage umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is my third order for this sport umbrella. My daughter in law used her umbrella for my granddaughter's sporting events and outdoor dance performances. Unfortunately, it only lasted a year before it was broke. I'm disappointed that this is not a durable product. I have had mine for two years but I don't use it very often. The umbrella is essential for my granddaughters to enjoy being outdoors. This is a fabulous concept, perfect sun protection, easy set up, light weight and compact are the pro pieces. The fact that this is not a durable sun umbrella if used often.
customer_reviews.author: Isa V-J

customer_reviews.title: Best. Beach umbrella. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beach umbrella- it's heavy duty (and therefore a bit heavy to carry), but well worth it. My friends and I went to the beach on what turned out to be a particularly windy day, and saw dozens of umbrellas turn inside out or just straight up blow away. But not ours. Our umbrella remained firmly staked in the sand, allowing us to bask in the shade while we laughed at the plebeians around us as they struggled with flimsy, inverted canopies.
customer_reviews.author: AZShopper

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Super big. Lots of shade. Looks well made. Cons: Product arrived dirty with what appears to be black grease spots. As described did not include carrying case, stakes or tie down cords. I do not believe this to be a new product but rather a return. I will be returning this product. Also, from the Amazon website, I am unable to add photos to this review.

customer_reviews.title: Works on the beach with right accessories.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item specifically because it has grommets around perimeter. Allows attachment to sand anchors to secure Sportbrella in windy beach conditions. Fairly easy to operate so long as the user recognizes which way the wind is blowing while opening an 8-foot diameter sail. Suggest keeping the windows open to spill maximum wind. I use a sand auger to hold umbrella shaft because the shaft is narrow and easily worked loose in beach sand. Strap on carrying case started fraying on first use. I'm hoping for better performance from umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: ACAR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up but be sure to check it over for tears in material
customer_reviews.text: Works great for protecting baby from sun. Easy to set up. We set it up in our yard when we received it to check the quality and set up of it. We were disappointed when we noticed a small tear near top of the umbrella. Hopefully it doesnt cause it to rip in the future. Seems not to be an issue right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but not exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The main pole is better used for sports events than it is for the beach. The newer version has the twist for easier beach securing. Sadly, this one wasn’t as easy to secure and the metal rods for the sides didn’t stay within the sand. I’m surprised but maybe it should have come with instructions? I know I know, not like I would have read them but at least then I would have known there were instructions. Returning to get the newer version with the twist center pole.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product at the end of January and unfortunately, right after receiving COVID-19 happened and I wasn’t able to use. I left the product in the packing. Today was the first time using and assembling and the product is cheap. Very very disappointed. Center pole would not stay extended when latched down so umbrella came blowing up and away. I can’t believe I wasted money on this item. Do not be fooled by high reviews. Complete junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rodman

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and takedown
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use on our vacation to the gulf coast. We were pleased with the ease of setup and tear down. There are stakes that come with the Sport-Brella, however, they could be of better quality. I feel if the stakes were longer that it would add to the stability of the umbrella. It was windy on the gulf but overall, it held up well. I am pleased with our purchase and I feel we will get several more uses out of this.
customer_reviews.author: KatF

customer_reviews.title: Beach umbrella that does NOT work at the beach
customer_reviews.text: Went to use the umbrella at the beach as it is pictured in the advertisement and was not even able to use the umbrella at all. The main pole is not made well so the pole slides right through the clip.. that part would have been okay once you steal the rest of the umbrella into the ground.... but..... of course now of the steaks they send you are even close to being long or strong enough to hold something down in the sand.... will be immediately returning when I get home from the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Queen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sun Protection. Would comfortably Seat 3 Adult Beach chairs
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase! I am an extremely fair woman who was looking for easy and effective beach protection. This umbrella was definitely effective and easy to setup. My only suggestion is you purchase separate sand anchors because the ones that it comes with didn't seem to hold in the sand well. I was fortunate to not be at a windy beach but I would imagine that they would not hold down in an extreme wind event. This umbrella is also very light and easy to setup and carry. Like others have said, the strap on the carrying back is cheaply made so you may want to reinforce it or use another bag altogether.
customer_reviews.author: geoginger17

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: I like the umbrella/tent, but is was defective. One of the zippers does not work (the zipper spreads open when you try to close it) and the was stitching missing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Presto

customer_reviews.title: Easy Beach Set-up
customer_reviews.text: Smartest purchase ever. We took these to the beach and they were light enough for my two 10 year olds to carry the lengthy of a football field without breaking a sweat. They are super roomey and were easy to set up. If you have a smaller car you may want to consud er the length of these. I wish they came with more big pegs to hold down the wings in the sand. We filled the pockets in the wings with sand to help anchor them. Other than that no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Millennial Mom Pro on the Go

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I figured I'd get a sturdy umbrella for vacation. Instead I received a giant paperweight with that was already falling apart taking it from the box. As soon as we opened it, the metal supports were broken and another broke and ripped from material. Now I have 0 options for my vacation other than to spend another $50 somewhere down here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for small families!! Is kind of a struggle to get up and down and carry around but that's a good thing because this is a very sturdy and great quality umbrella! I was very impressed for the price point but it's good for picnics, outdoor activities, beach time, and indoor forts on rainy days! So much easier than a shelter you have to put up and better for windy days. It's very big too, we fit our whole little family under it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rafting umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I'm a boater, and shade on sunny river trips is an integral part of being able to drink a bunch of beers during a long day on the water. With a little modification, this umbrella fit into the umbrella holder on my cataraft very nicely. There isn't a better umbrella for raft trips!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rende

customer_reviews.title: invest in sand ancors
customer_reviews.text: love this item can fit a couple comfortably with room for a picnic in between. Light and convenient, however, invest in a sand anchor for the main pole and smaller ones for the sides of the umbrella to make sure the wind doesn't carry it away. great investment.
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Can not withstand winds
customer_reviews.text: My family and I went to the beach this past weekend. I started to assemble the umbrella by opening it. The wind blew and the umbrella turned inside out and broke. This umbrella is meant for "extreme winds" per the description....this was not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella for those really sunny beach days
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is the quality of the stitching. After assembly, i noticed a giant tag on the inside of the umbrella. I ripped it off and unfortunately, the stitching for the umbrella came off with it. I'll have to go back and sew that part of the umbrella so that it doesn't come un-done any more. Other than that no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Deamon

customer_reviews.title: Best addition to camping ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I wouldn’t get roasted sitting by the lake when we camp. My husband and I took it for its first spin on a trip just the two of us to a high elevation camping spot with no shade. This thing seriously saved us. We sat under it for hours reading and eating. And, it withstood some seriously intense winds. The only thing I would say it needs is a hook and stake for the end of the pole that sits on the ground to tether it there. Otherwise, this has changed our camping and sporting game for the better.
customer_reviews.author: RinPet

customer_reviews.title: Super thin center pole!
customer_reviews.text: Center Pole is super thin (like half a normal death umbrella), spikes are too short and light duty for deep sand at beach. After 45 minute or trying to make it work I finally just gave up. You'd try to get one side in and qhen you went to the other side it would just pull out. Center pole was too narrow and weak to give it the stability and support to stand upright. Maybe with no wind... hard sand and not attempting to stand it up it would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Great shade and rain protection while easy
customer_reviews.text: I love my Sunbrella! I've used it at the beach and poolside at swim meets. At the beach: really easy to set up. Way easier to get into the ground than the traditional umbrellas. Enough space to keep our gear protected. Poolside: provided shade for my husband and I to watch our kids at a swim meet. When the thunder clouds rolled in during a meet, all of the other families were jealous of mine, as the whole family fit under the Sunbrella while we waited for the hordes of people to funnel through the tiny exit. Several people asked me where they could buy one. Really easy to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Katbake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome umbrella, very sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is amazing. Bought it right before or vacation to the beach. While we were there a wind storm blew in and this umbrella didn't even falter in the high winds. Since then we have been using it at our kids sports to protect us from the sun and give us some shade. Easy set up and year down. My only complaint would be that the clamp to hold the extendable rod doesn't hold under pressure very well when standing the umbrella up straight,, but it still works provided you don't tighten the ties too much.
customer_reviews.author: mvwalkuski

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, you won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our top favorite purchases!!! It's so easy to set up and take down, and you can literally take it anywhere. We live in Utah, where there are outdoor events all summer long. Between outdoor events, camping trips and lake days, we are going to be using this OFTEN! It's durable, you can tell it's well made and it's so easy to set up, take down and carry around (really lightweight) We just attended an outdoor concert yesterday and the entire hill was full of these, which speaks numbers about how awesome they are!!!
customer_reviews.author: CrystalJane

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality- don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Decent upper half, but the bottom spike that goes into the sand is hollow. A hollow design makes it weak, and mine bent the first time I used it in the sand. One use, and its trash already. The price is right, but the quality is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Better than a pop-up tent for beach
customer_reviews.text: Bought this umbrella when our pop-up beach tent finally broke and I definitely don't regret it. This is much easier to set-up and take down and provides a lot more protective area than the tent did. It also seems to hold up much better against normal beach breezes (I haven't tried it in really windy conditions, so I can't comment on that). The only thing it doesn't have that I wish it did is some sort of built in/roll out floor. You need to put 2 extra large beach down first, and set the sportbrella up over them, to really take advantage of the full shade area.
customer_reviews.author: sh7482x

customer_reviews.title: wine and snacks stayed nice and dry
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have one of these and used it for a James Taylor show at Tanglewood last year. THANK GOODNESS, because it poured the entire time. We, our chairs, our cooler, and all of our beer, wine and snacks stayed nice and dry. We even had room to take in our lawn neighbors' stuff. We love our so much we bought five more to give as gifts this Christmas. :)
customer_reviews.author: Debra Anne

customer_reviews.title: 3x heavier than advertised
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very heavy to carry if you're also trying to carry a beach chair, a bag with your towel and sunscreen, and a small cooler. I just weighed the bag and it's about 9 lbs. with the bag of stakes. The description says it weighs 3.3 lbs. NOT TRUE. It's a good size, but what a pain in the butt to lug it around!
customer_reviews.author: elf

customer_reviews.title: Makes other baseball parents jealous!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the sidelines of enough baseball and softball games to know what kind of sun and rain protection works best. This umbrella is awesome because two people can watch a game hands-free, without having to constantly hold up a UV umbrella. The wind vents are great so that it doesn't get too warm under the umbrella. The handle telescopes and adjusts to shield the sun, and the stakes hold the umbrella down on windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Mililani Mom

customer_reviews.title: Felt like a hot shot bringing this to a beach trip ...
customer_reviews.text: Felt like a hot shot bringing this to a beach trip with friends. Huge and offered excellent shade, was very wind resistant on a very windy NC beach. But the second time we tried to use it, the telescoping stake in the handle would just collapse when we tried to push it into the sand, even though it was locked. This made it difficult to ensure stability, and we ended up just mounding sand around the handle and staking and weighing down the side flaps with sand. It stayed, but it's something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella. I take it right up into the stands on super sunny and hot days. It has saved me at countless track meets. I share it with strangers who need a break from the heat. If put at the top of bleachers and angled properly, it can throw shade on a few ROWS. At high noon, you can shade about 4 adults and little ones can get underneath the smaller side easily .
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: This is rather large, but doesn't provide as much shade as you'd think. Kind of a pain to set up, and has some pretty serious stakes to put it in the ground. Not an easy pop up tent that you'd hope for at the beach. Shade is very important to me, as my family has a history of skin cancer, so we will continue to use it but I'll be looking for something easier. As a mom with two kids setup being easy is important.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A

customer_reviews.title: Best sports umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. I have spent years trying to find the best sports umbrella, and I think this is the one I'll keep. I haven't tried staking it in the ground. At soccer games, I usually just pop it open, extend the pole and put the whole thing on the ground. It's big enough to fit chairs underneath, and I don't have to worry about it falling out of the ground or the wind taking it. It works great for bleachers too. I also used it my daughter's whole cheerleading season at morning football games.
customer_reviews.author: CarolaV

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I'm a single mom to a young child and this cover is everything I could ask for. I had looked at this umbrella a few times on Amazon and saw one in person on the beach before I actually bought it. Light but quality material, easy to set up and I wasn't chasing after a blown away umbrella all day. I visit the beach often and am very glad with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenee J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: If you can open an umbrella you can set up this sunshade. It easily withstood the wind at the beach. We filled the side pockets with sand and used the included anchors. It really made our beach day more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jane

customer_reviews.title: To much wait for not what you bought
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed with this purchase, they send me the color that I don’t want and even was not the color that I ordered. I wait long time like a month for this umbrella when Arrived I wasn’t home so I take my time for try it and see if works then I release that the color was different I try to return it but the limited for that was expired so bad
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: Okay at the beach but durability is a concern.
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella mechanism functions well and provides good coverage at the beach. It can be a hassle to setup if there's moderate wind, and I had to buy extra, stronger stakes to secure the umbrella (the tiny metal stakes are impractical in most sand, I'd imagine). After a handful of beach trips there's already rust on some metal components. That's the quickest I've had beach gear show rust across various umbrella and chair purchases over the years. All in all, it's okay/average for beach use. My advice would be to wait for one of the frequent sales to make sure you don't put too much money into something that doesn't seem particularly durable.
customer_reviews.author: AlBSure

customer_reviews.title: Makes the beach more enjoyable!
customer_reviews.text: I love the outdoors, but as I get older, I just can’t handle the sun like I used to! If this sounds like you, or if you have young children, I would highly recommend this umbrella. We used it for the first time yesterday, and it was perfect! Easy to put up, provided excellent shade, and the side windows kept things cool. We were able to fit three adults and two children comfortable lounging on towels. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly a must have in every home. I chose the color option that was available and it was delivered in a day. Just in time for a very hot beach day. It was easy to carry crossbody and stash on a 45 minute train ride. Mind you we had other stuff along with a baby and a stroller and carrying this was the least of our worries. It was super easy to open up, close and move around when the sun was on us. Again I can’t stress how much of a lifesaver this was given how hot it was. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Mahalakshmi Lokesh

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to set up
customer_reviews.text: Took this for our beach trip and spent a good 30 minutes trying to get the clamp undone. Very difficult to open. Also not a great set up for hot beaches because there is no air flow even with the windows vents open
customer_reviews.author: The.Lincolnplace

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Well worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella is excellent, easy to set up and tear down, and we can fit almost 3 people across sitting in Tommy Bahama chairs. We’ve had it now for about 2 months with consistent use (set up and tear down 2-3 times a week) and no signs of wear. It is still holding up well. We bought this for our kids games when it’s hot and no shade. Only draw back is it can get stuffy underneath the umbrella, make sure you open the side vents to help draw in new air.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella!!! Anyone that has kids in sports should have one, its has protected me from rain, cold wind, and hot burning sun!!! Its a good size, my husband and I both fit sitting on our camping chairs. Also its very easy to put up and put away, badically its a large umbrella and as easy to put away as a camping chair!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Bee Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great product for the parks, somewhere with firm ground to anchor the steaks. Took this to the beach and the steaks are too short to anchor into the beach sand. Maybe if you can dig down and have at least foot long steaks. It was not too mindy but the wind kept taking it away.
customer_reviews.author: ricardo calbert

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for it to not stay in the ground
customer_reviews.text: I bought the umbrella thinking that based on price, it would be good. The pole is too thin for it to fit right in the one size anchor. I thought it'd be OK if I used the stakes it comes with. The stakes do not hold the umbrella down. I dug holes in the sand trying to stabilize the umbrella, but all that did was that when it went flying the second time, I lost the stakes so now I can't return it. My other umbrella (as well as that of other people) stayed in place the whole time. Save your money. Buy an umbrella with a thicker pole so it could be more secure when a breeze hits it
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Verges

product_meta.title: Sport-Brella Vented SPF 50+ Sun and Rain Canopy Umbrella for Beach and Sports Events (8-Foot)
product_meta.description: A beach umbrella, sun tent and more! On the sidelines or at the beach, the SKLZ Sport-Brella gives you instant portable protection from the sun, rain, and wind with UPF 50+ protection. It sets up in just three seconds and opens up to 7' wide, fitting the family or the whole team.
feature_bullets: UPF 50+ PROTECTION. The Sport-Brella XL will keep your skin safe and protected from UVA and UVB rays. With side panels for extra coverage and wind flaps for ventilation and airflow, you’ll get everything you need
UPF 50+ sun and weather protection and water repellent, protects over 99.5% of UVA and UVB rays
Canopy supported by 4.5 mm steel ribs and a 5mm steel stretcher
Telescoping pole with a metal tip held in place by steel screw
Dual canopy with top wind vents and strong, side zippered windows for efficient airflow

TIP: If conditions are windy, use 2 Anchor Cords with the Heavy Duty Ground Stakes for extra wind security; Tip Pockets provide added support for windier conditions; it can be filled with heavy objects or even sand for extra weight
